Package engine

Class GameData

java.lang.Object
engine.GameData
public class GameData extends Object
Class that groups together all core runtime data of a game session.

  • Field Summary

    Queue.LinkedQueue<Player>

  • Constructor Details

    • GameData

      public GameData(Queue.LinkedQueue<Player> turnQueue, Lists.ArrayUnorderedList<Player> todosJogadores, Lists.ArrayUnorderedList<Enigma> enigmasDisponiveis, Dificuldade dificuldade)
      Creates a new GameData instance with all core game components.
      Parameters:
      turnQueue - queue representing the turn order of players
      todosJogadores - list with all players in the current game
      enigmasDisponiveis - list of riddles available to be used
      dificuldade - selected global difficulty of the game
